Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meteorcode.pathway.model.Context

  • public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
    A Context in which Event stacks are evaluated.

      • fireEvent

        public void fireEvent(Event e)
        Fires an Event onto the EventStack corresponding to this Context.

        Parameters:
        e - the Event fired onto the EventStack;

      • pump

        public void pump()
        Pops off the top Event in the stack, notifies any subscribed Properties, and then evaluates that Event.

        Each Property attached to this Context s given the opportunity to invalidate() the Event when they are notified. If no Property invalidates the Event, it will be evaluated once all Properties have been notified.

        Throws:
        ScriptException - if the Context's associated ScriptContainer encounters an error when evaluating the Event.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
